A source told the Daily Mirror: Simon Cowell wants him and three beautiful girls on the panel. He will sit there like the cat that got the cream. Lindsay Lohan is notorious but she will give the show an edginess. "There's been serious talks but Lindsay Lohan 's legal issues and her commitment to stay sober need to be worked through. She knows this could turn her life around. Cheryl Cole and Nicole Scherzinger are frontrunners for roles on the show when it launches in America later this year but Simon Cowell is still trying to decide on the perfect combination. The most memorable ad during Sunday's Super Bowl- Chrysler's historic two-minute spot featuring rap star Eminem- was a gut-wrenching decision for the carmaker's chief executive Sergio Marchionne . This was not an easy choice... apart from the money involved... and this is pretty expensive stuff, but you know, the choice of the topic, the choice of the characters in the thing were not easy choices. I had to think about this really long and hard, Sergio Marchionne said. Why? I asked him. "You know, I love Eminem but... statement that some objects including a Heart Scarab and a small Ushabti statue were found. Part of a coffin dating back to the Modern Kingdom 3,000 years ago was also found outside the museum. We found two of the eight missing artefacts outside the museum between a government building that got burnt and the gift shop. We are continuing the search and will find more, Zahi Hawass told Reuters. A number of leading politicians also expressed indignation, and ANSA news agency said talks were planned next week between Sergio Marchionne and Economic Development Minister Paolo Romani . In the next two or three years we will be able to see a single entity. It could be based here in the United States, Corriere della Sera quoted Sergio Marchionne as saying. Steve Ballmer himself weighed in at the meeting between the two presidents and US business leaders, according to statement on Microsoft's blog. At the meeting, Steve Ballmer highlighted the importance of intellectual property, or IP, to the future success and economic development of both countries, and noted the serious IP piracy problems that currently exist in China, the statement said.
